name: Loch Ness Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the place to stay if you are after friendly attentive service, outstanding food and comfortable rooms at an everyday price
reviews.title: The best of everythig

likes.disliked: — too far away to visit regularly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Perfection

likes.liked: — the quality of the place, the friendlyness of the staff and the suberb food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: following the reviews in TA we booked the Inn directly for 3 nights B&B for £99 each.
reviews.title: Great place in Drumnadrochit
Fantastic Hotel
reviews.text: the Inn is 15 miles south west of Inverness in Lewiston on Loch Ness - go west and you'll get to Skye in around an hour
the property has only been open a few months and the rooms are brand new - spacious room, on-suite with fresh towels every day and an LCD Tv.
reviews.title: Lovely Loch Ness Inn

likes.liked: — modern rooms that kept character though.

reviews.text: They tell me it's becoming known as a 'restaurant with rooms' as the quality of the food is fantastic!! - better than some 5* hotels - with locally sourced produce on the menu plus specials.
reviews.title: Great new inn near Loch Ness

likes.disliked: — Noise from the bar at night

description: The Loch Ness Inn, conveniently located between Drumnadrochit and Urquhart Castle in the village of Lewiston and only 15 miles from Inverness, is set in the heart of the local community where you will meet hikers, tourists and locals in friendly comfortable surroundings
